attributes.action: Intervene and request that the logo for the Olympics be reviewed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We hereby ask the prime minster to use his influence and request that logo chosen for the Olympics be reviewed and changed, so that we may find a logo that represnts London and not the whims of a commercial brand.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/2012-Emblem/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
